# rafay_import_cluster (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "rafay_import_cluster" "import_cluster" {
  clustername      = "dev1"
  projectname      = "dev1-description"
  blueprint        = ""
  location         = ""
  kube_config_path = ""
  description      = ""
}
```
